title: Creating a Collection and Display attributes
quizTitle:
Update the sui_fren module to create an NFT collection for SuiFrens using the OriginByte standard. Make sure you don't forget any imports. Also remember the main one time witness type has to be named in a specific way (check out the first course if you forgot).
The SuiFren collection should have the following display attributes:
1. name: "SuiFrens"
2. description: "A collection of SuiFrens who hangout together"

For now we'll not share the MintCap object.
